title: Better Sit Down Boy
lyrics:
You better sit down boy
Better take a seat
Let me teach you something
All eyes on me
Oh you better sit down boy

Better take a seat

Let me teach you something 'bout love

Ok repeat (repeat)



Oh baby god damn

Me oh my

I'm gonna be kind

I'm feeling pretty cool

Baby god damn

Me oh my

I'll tell you one time



You better shape up boy

Better earn your keep

Oh you speak french

Oh man that's neat



You better keep up boy

You better not sleep

You wanna learn about love?

Ok watch me



You better sit down boy

Better take a seat

Let me teach you something

All eyes on me



A ring a ding ding boy

A ring a ding ding

Yeah baby you can keep calling

It ain't no thing



Hello



Oh baby god damn

Me oh my

I'm gonna be kind

I'm feeling pretty cool

Baby god damn

Me oh my

I'll tell you one time



Better sit down boy

Better sit down boy
